mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_no, sno, writer, title, content) VALUES (#{reviewNo}, #{sno}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select:
SELECT r.*, u.user_nick, s.bplc_nm FROM review r JOIN users u ON r.writer = u.user_id JOIN store s ON r.sno = s.sno
ORDER BY review_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{cpp}

mapper.update: UPDATE review SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = current_timestamp WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo}
